attributes.action: Give all students free HEALTHY school meals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Provide students from ages 4 - 18 (from primary school to college) with free healthy school meals. In healthy school meals the students will get a wide choice to assist them with a balanced diet

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
